content.rendered:
Every Person Deserves the Chance to Live Independently

At Henpresscare, we believe independence looks different for everyone. That’s why we provide tailored in-home support and community programs that help individuals with disabilities build skills, make connections, and live life on their own terms.

Because independence isn’t one-size-fits-all.

Learn More
Our Services

Why HenPressCare Feels Like Home

At HenPressCare, compassion isn’t just a word, it’s how we operate every day. From the moment you (or your loved one) reach out, our team listens first: what matters most, what goals you have, and how you’d like to spend each day. We build all our programs around that foundation of respect, empathy, and genuine partnership.

Our Values

Personalized Approach

Every individual has unique strengths. We design care plans that show personal preferences, goals, and routines, whether that’s cooking favorite meals, learning new skills, or going on group outings.

Community Integration

Friends, neighbors, social connections, that sense of belonging transforms lives. We help participants join recreational groups, volunteer teams, and local events, so they feel fully part of their community

Growth & Learning

Skill building never stops. We work one-on-one and in small groups to teach money management, basic cooking, social communication, and more. Always starting from where each person is and moving at a pace that feels right.

Family Collaboration

You know your loved one best. Our caregivers and program coordinators partner closely with family members and guardians, providing regular updates, hosting coaching sessions, and sharing resources so everyone feels supported.

Our Core Service Areas

Below you can see the four main pillars of our programming. Click “Details” under each to jump to more information further down the page.

Supported Living

Personalized in-home support so clients can thrive in a familiar environment.

Details

Skill Development

Hands-on workshops, from cooking simple meals to budgeting and everyday communication.

Details

Day Programs

Engaging group activities that promote social skills, creativity, and self-confidence.

Details

Family & Caregiver Support

Coaching, peer groups, and practical resources to help families navigate this journey together.

Details

HenPressCare at a Glance

Fast Facts
Trust & Commitment
Caring Hearts
Compassion: Trusted for Life
Fast Facts

HenPressCare at a Glance

  • Established: 2010

  • Clients Served Last Year: 120+ individuals across three counties

  • Staff Credentials: All caregivers complete CPR/First-Aid, behavioral health training, and ongoing professional development

  • Average Caregiver Tenure: 4.5 years (our retention means consistency you can rely on)

  • Accreditations: Licensed by State Health Department, CARF Accredited (Commission on Accreditation of Rehabilitation Facilities)

Trust & Commitment

It’s Not Just What We Do, It’s How We Do It

We know trust is earned, and it comes from showing up on time, following through on promises, and treating everyone—clients, families, or referral partners—with the same dignity we’d want for our own loved ones. Here’s how we build that trust every single day:

  • 24/7 Availability: Our on-call coordinators are reachable around the clock. Emergencies can’t wait, and neither do we.

  • Transparent Communication: You’ll get weekly progress notes, monthly check-in calls, and quarterly family meetings so you’re never out of the loop.

  • Certified Experts: From behavior specialists to licensed social workers and experienced nurses, our team covers the full spectrum of care needs.

  • Ongoing Training: Caregivers complete at least 20 hours of specialized training each year—everything from positive behavior supports to adaptive communication strategies.

Caring Hearts

 You’ll Feel Right at Home

  • Our caregivers treat you like family, offering a friendly smile, listening ear, and a hand when you need it.

  • Meals are freshly prepared with your dietary needs and preferences in mind, whether that’s gluten-free, vegetarian, or culturally specific recipes.

  • Private living spaces (or shared quarters, if preferred) come equipped with emergency call systems and adaptive furniture as needed.

  • Transportation to appointments, social outings, and errands, because getting out and about shouldn’t be a hassle.

Compassion: Trusted for Life

Every member of the HenPressCare family believes that true compassion isn’t one-size-fits-all. Whether we’re helping someone learn to navigate public transit on their own or simply dropping off a favorite bakery treat, our goal is to treat each person with respect, kindness, and unwavering patience. You won’t find cookie-cutter solutions here—only real, lasting relationships built on mutual trust and understanding.

  • Our Professionals
    Meet our team of licensed social workers, occupational therapists, and certified direct-support professionals who bring decades of combined experience.

  • Emergency Response
    All caregivers are trained in CPR and First Aid. In the rare event of a crisis, we have a clear protocol to ensure rapid medical attention and follow-up support.

  • Community Partnerships
    We collaborate with local vocational programs, theater groups, and adaptive sports leagues so our participants can try new things—and succeed—in supportive environments.

  • Health & Wellness
    Our registered dietitians and nurses work together to create personalized wellness plans—covering everything from medication management to adaptive exercise routines.

Request a Call Back

Want to Talk One-on-One?

We know that choosing in-home care or day programming is a big decision. Let us answer your questions, walk you through our enrollment steps, and learn more about how we can meet your family’s needs. Fill out the form below, and someone from our intake team will call you within one business day, often within hours.
